name: SiYuan
short_desc: SiYuan is a privacy-first personal knowledge management system.
author: siyuan-note
description: SiYuan is a privacy-first personal knowledge management system, support fine-grained block-level reference and Markdown WYSIWYG.

form_fields.label: Workspace Name
form_fields.hint: The name of the workspace to create.

form_fields.label: Access Auth Code
form_fields.hint: Please be sure to modify, otherwise anyone can read and write your data.
